content:
Hi there,

I am looking for a "hello world" type of wasip2 Command component for testing a feature at runwasi for support component model in wasmtime shim. Tried to look at the wasmtime repo but didn't find anything at the moment. Appreicate if you could point me to where something like this exists. Thanks! :pray:
Ah nvm, cargo component new --command is super easy to use to create a component targeting the wasi:cli/command world
Mossaka (Joe) has marked this topic as resolved.
